ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- payload map (data, index) -> { "Id" : data.Id, "ProductCode": data."Product Code", "Family" : data."Product Family", "Description": data."Product Description", "Name" : data."Product Name" }

%dw 2.0 output application/json var response = payload.items[0] --- [ { "created": response.payload.created, "success": response.payload.success, "id": response.payload.id, "errors": response.statusCode } ]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java var response = payload.items[0] --- if ((response.payload.created is true) and response.payload.success is true) 201 else if ((response.payload.created is false) and response.payload.success is true) 200 else 500
